name: Use at most one statement per line
description: List of all Procedures and Functions with more than 1 statement per line
output:
This report lists all Procedures and Functions with more than 1 statement per line
It provides the following information: 

-  Function / Procedure full name,
- number of lines with more than 1 statement
rationale:
There should not be more than one statement per line of code.
Statements are separated by ';'

When writing  many statements on the same line, code becomes more difficult to read and therefore more difficult to maintain.
remediation: Edit code to have one single statement per line
total: total is number of  SQL procedures and functions that are stored in the schema
